title: Assignment 01
text:
System Details

import platform
import psutil
import sys

def get_size(bytes):
    """
    Convert bytes to human readable format
    """
    for unit in ['', 'K', 'M', 'G', 'T', 'P']:
        if bytes < 1024:
            return f"{bytes:.2f}{unit}B"
        bytes /= 1024

# Basic System Information
print(f"Operating System: {platform.system()}")
print(f"OS Version: {platform.version()}")
print(f"Python Version: {sys.version.split()[0]}")
print(f"Processor: {platform.processor()}")

# Memory Information
memory = psutil.virtual_memory()
print(f"\nTotal Memory: {get_size(memory.total)}")
print(f"Available Memory: {get_size(memory.available)}")

Operating System: Linux
OS Version: #18~24.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Sat Jun 28 04:46:03 UTC 2025
Python Version: 3.12.11
Processor: x86_64

Total Memory: 15.62GB
Available Memory: 14.40GB

title: About Me
text: I am Saurabh, a seasoned software management professional with over 20 years of experience in the technology industry. As a certified PMP, Scrum, and SAFe practitioner, I’ve dedicated my career to building and leading high-performing software teams across multiple geographies and business domains.

title: About Me

As a certified PMP, Scrum, and SAFe practitioner, I’ve dedicated my career to building and leading high-performing software teams across multiple geographies and business domains.

title: Welcome!
text:
I’m Saurabh, a passionate technologist and software engineering professional. This space serves as a window into my professional journey, projects, and technical insights.


I am a software engineer with expertise in building scalable applications and distributed systems. My technical journey has been driven by a constant desire to learn and create impactful solutions.







 Cloud Architecture & Development
 Distributed Systems
 Full Stack Development
 System Design & Architecture
 DevOps & CI/CD
 Agile Methodologies





 Java & Spring Framework
 Cloud Platforms (GCP/AWS/Azure)
 Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
 Microservices Architecture
 Database Systems
 REST/GraphQL APIs






I believe in:

 Writing clean, testable and maintainable code
 Building scalable and resilient systems
 Continuous learning and improvement
 Sharing knowledge and mentoring others
 Solving complex problems with simple solutions

Feel free to explore my  projects or learn more  about me.
